thread.title: BRIEF-Stanusch Technologies gets order for virtual advisor technology
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Stanusch Technologies gets order for virtual advisor technology

title: BRIEF-Stanusch Technologies gets order for virtual advisor technology
text:
BRIEF-Stanusch Technologies gets order for virtual advisor technology Sept 21 
Sept 21 Stanusch Technologies SA : 
* Gets an order from teamLeaders Sp. z o.o. Sp. K. to deliver the company virtual advisor technology to JZO Sp. Z o.o. 
* The value of the deal has not been disclosed Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
